mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_id,product_id,qna_title, qna_content, writer, write_date) VALUES(null, #{product_id},#{qna_title},#{qna_content},#{writer}, now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qna WHERE qna_id = #{qna_id} and product_id = #{product_id} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.select: SELECT * from qna WHERE product_id = #{product_id} ORDER BY write_date
